# roxycode RoxyCode is a cross platform AI coding assistant
## Usage
### Running with Maven To run the jsmashy CLI from source using Maven, use the following command from the project root:
```bash mvn exec:java -pl jsmashy-cli -Dexec.mainClass="org.roxycode.jsmashy.cli.Main" -Dexec.args="<input-dir> <output-file>" ```
### Convenience Script A convenience script `jsmashy.sh` is provided in the root directory.
```bash ./jsmashy.sh <input-dir> <output-file> ```
